Bedrock Wisdom https://github.com/bedrockwisdom/bedrockwisdompod en-us
Tyler Robbins Seeking to understand the many ideas, religious and secular, that unite us. Tyler Robbins
Seeking to understand the many ideas, religious and secular, that unite us.
Religious,secular,science,Christianity,Judaism,Buddhism,Islam,Zen,Hindu,Pagan,Sikh,Native American,pagan,tradition,Jain,spirituality,society,history
Have you ever wondered what Quakers, Jains, and Sikhs have in common? Why is it that ascetic practices have been revered in nearly all parts of the world? Did you know that many ‘new’ discoveries in psychology are now validating ideas that the Buddha taught 2,500 years ago? In this series we explore the underlying concepts and ideas that appear to be at the core of many religious, and at times secular, traditions.
Tyler Robbins bedrockwisdom@gmail.com
